= Padrino Framework Static Files

Here you can find <tt>JS</tt>, <tt>UJS</tt>, <tt>CSS</tt> and other static files used by <tt>padrino-framework</tt>

Feel free to fork it and help us to keep everything updated.

You can find <tt>JS</tt> and <tt>UJS</tt> adapters for:

* dojo (ujs not finished)
* ext (ujs not finished)
* jquery (ujs available)
* prototype (ujs available)
* mootools (ujs not finished)
* right (ujs not finished)

<b>Padrino Framework Staff</b>
